# Dependencies and packages
vendor/
node_modules/

# Configuration files (with sensitive data)
includes/config.php

# Uploaded files
uploads/*
!uploads/.gitkeep

# IDE and Editor files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.sublime-project
*.sublime-workspace
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Log files
*.log
error_log
access_log

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.temp
*.swp
*.swo
*~

# Backup files
*.bak
*.backup
*.old

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Desktop.ini

# Cache files
cache/
tmp/
temp/
